text: Niscayanga, a (antima) ghadiya jnanam, kevalam allah ku matrame undi. Mariyu ayane varsam kuripincevadu mariyu garbhalalo unnadani visayam telisinavadu. Mariyu tanu repu emi sampadistado, e manavudu kuda erugadu. Mariyu e manavudu kuda tanu e bhubhaganlo maranistado kuda erugadu. Niscayanga, allah matrame sarvajnudu, samastam telisinavadu (eriginavadu)
